meta.name: Create personalized Loom video scripts from Upwork jobs with Claude AI

name: Generate Loom Outreach Assets from Upwork Jobs with AI

parameters.content:
## Generate Loom Outreach Assets from Upwork Jobs with AI

This workflow transforms Upwork job postings into personalized Loom video outreach assets in ~60 seconds. Paste a job description and get a complete outreach package.

### How it works
1. **Submit job** via web form (title, description, client name)
2. **AI analyzes** the job - extracts industry, pain points, tools, budget/urgency signals
3. **AI generates** complete Loom script, before/after comparison, flow diagram, proposal snippet
4. **Saves** all assets to Google Doc, logs lead to Sheets, notifies via Slack

### Setup
‚òê Add **Anthropic API** credential (HTTP Header Auth, header: `x-api-key`)
‚òê Add **Google Docs** and **Google Sheets** OAuth2 credentials
‚òê Add **Slack API** credential
‚òê Update `Create Output Doc` ‚Üí Set your Google Drive folder ID
‚òê Update `Log Lead to Sheets` ‚Üí Set your spreadsheet ID
‚òê Update both Slack nodes ‚Üí Set your channel ID
‚òê Create Sheet with columns: Timestamp | Prospect Name | Industry | Business Function | Pain Point | Tokens Used | Google Doc Link | Version

### Customize
- Edit "MY BACKGROUND" in `Generate Loom Script with AI` node
- Adjust industry hourly rates and time savings
- Modify pricing guidance and CTA

## 1. Capture Job
User submits Upwork job details via web form

## 2. Analyze  Upwork Job Description
Claude extracts industry, pain points, tools, budget & urgency signals

## 3. Generate Assets
Claude creates Loom script, before/after, flow diagram, proposal snippet

## 4. Save & Notify
Saves to Google Doc, logs to Sheets, sends Slack notification

## Error Path
Notifies via Slack if job parsing fails

values.formSubmittedText: ‚úÖ Analyzing job description... Assets will be ready in ~45 seconds. Check Slack!

values.placeholder: e.g., Need Notion CRM Expert for Pipeline Automation
e.g., John or leave blank if not visible
Paste the full Upwork job description here...

parameters.formDescription: Paste an Upwork job description and generate personalized Loom outreach assets automatically.

parameters.jsonBody:
={{ (() => {
  const jobTitle = ($json['Job Title'] || '').replace(/[\n\r]/g, ' ').replace(/"/g, "'").trim();
  const clientName = ($json['Client Name (if known)'] || '').replace(/[\n\r]/g, ' ').replace(/"/g, "'").trim();
  const jobDescription = ($json['Job Description'] || '').replace(/[\n\r]/g, ' ').replace(/"/g, "'").trim();
  const jobUrl = $json['Upwork Job URL (Optional)'] || '';

  const prompt = `You are an expert at analyzing Upwork job postings to identify automation opportunities.

Analyze this job description and extract structured data for a cold outreach Loom video.

## JOB DETAILS
Title: ${jobTitle}
Client Name: ${clientName || 'Not provided'}
Job URL: ${jobUrl || 'Not provided'}

## FULL JOB DESCRIPTION
${jobDescription}

## YOUR TASK
Extract the following information. Be specific and actionable.

## EXTRACTION RULES
1. Industry: Infer from the job description. Choose the BEST match from:
   - Recruiting / Staffing
   - MSP / IT Services
   - Coaching / Consulting
   - Accounting / Bookkeeping
   - Marketing Agency
   - Real Estate
   - Healthcare
   - E-commerce
   - Legal Services
   - Investment / M&A
   - Professional Services
   - Other (specify)

2. Business Function: What do they primarily need automated? Choose BEST match:
   - CRM / Pipeline Management
   - Lead Management / Sales Pipeline
   - Accounts Receivable / Invoicing
   - Customer Support / Ticketing
   - Client Onboarding
   - Document Generation / Processing
   - Email / Communication Automation
   - Reporting / Dashboards
   - Workflow / Process Automation
   - Data Integration / Sync
   - Other (specify)

3. Pain Points: List the specific problems they mention or imply (bullet points)

4. Tools Mentioned: List any specific tools/platforms mentioned

5. Automation Opportunities: What specific automations could you build for them?

6. Prospect Name: Use client name if provided, otherwise use a professional placeholder

7. Hook Angle: What specific pain or desire should the Loom video address first?

8. Budget Signal: Any indication of budget (budget mentioned, hourly rate, project complexity)

9. Urgency Signal: Any indication of timeline urgency?

10. Competition Risk: Is this a job many people will apply to? (High/Medium/Low)

## RESPOND IN THIS EXACT JSON FORMAT (no markdown, no code blocks):
{
  "prospect_name": "[Client name or 'Upwork Client']",
  "industry": "[Best match industry]",
  "business_function": "[Primary function to automate]",
  "pain_point": "[Main pain point - 1-2 sentences max]",
  "pain_points_detailed": ["pain 1", "pain 2", "pain 3"],
  "tools_mentioned": ["tool1", "tool2"],
  "tools_string": "[Comma-separated tools or 'Not specified']",
  "automation_opportunities": ["opportunity 1", "opportunity 2", "opportunity 3"],
  "hook_angle": "[Specific angle for Loom opening]",
  "budget_signal": "[Low/Medium/High/Unknown]",
  "urgency_signal": "[Low/Medium/High/Unknown]",
  "competition_risk": "[Low/Medium/High]",
  "job_title": "${jobTitle}",
  "job_url": "${jobUrl}",
  "recommended_approach": "[1-2 sentence strategy for this specific job]"
}

Respond with ONLY the JSON object. No explanations, no markdown formatting.`;

  return JSON.stringify({
    model: "claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens: 1500,
    messages: [
      {
        role: "user",
        content: prompt
      }
    ]
  });
})() }}

={{ (() => {
  const prospectName = $json.prospect_name || 'Prospect';
  const industry = $json.industry || 'Business';
  const businessFunction = $json.business_function || 'Operations';
  const painPoint = ($json.pain_point || '').replace(/[\n\r]/g, ' ').replace(/"/g, "'").trim();
  const knownTools = ($json.known_tools || 'their current systems').replace(/[\n\r]/g, ' ').replace(/"/g, "'").trim();
  const hookAngle = ($json.hook_angle || painPoint).replace(/[\n\r]/g, ' ').replace(/"/g, "'").trim();
  const automationOpps = ($json.automation_opportunities || []).join(', ');

  const prompt = `You are helping me create assets for a cold outreach Loom video to an Upwork prospect.

## INTERNAL REASONING (Do this first, but do NOT include in output)
Before generating:
1. This is an UPWORK JOB - they are actively looking for help
2. Identify the High-Value Friction Point for this industry
3. Design the automation to specifically solve their stated needs
4. Ensure the Before process feels tedious and manual
5. Ensure the After process feels like exactly what they asked for
6. Use vocabulary specific to their industry
7. Apply INDUSTRY-SPECIFIC time savings and hourly rates
8. Frame ROI as BOTH time recovered AND problem solved
9. Remember: This person POSTED A JOB - they want solutions

## INDUSTRY-SPECIFIC PARAMETERS

### Time Savings by Industry:
- Recruiting/Staffing: 5-8 hours/week
- MSP/IT Services: 4-6 hours/week
- Coaching/Consulting: 2-4 hours/week
- Accounting/Bookkeeping: 3-5 hours/week
- Marketing Agency: 4-6 hours/week
- Investment/M&A: 4-6 hours/week
- Professional Services: 3-5 hours/week
- Other: 4-6 hours/week

### Hourly Value by Industry:
- Recruiting/Staffing: $75/hour
- MSP/IT Services: $100/hour
- Coaching/Consulting: $75/hour
- Accounting/Bookkeeping: $50/hour
- Marketing Agency: $75/hour
- Investment/M&A: $150/hour
- Professional Services: $75/hour
- Other: $50/hour

## PROSPECT DETAILS (FROM UPWORK JOB)
- Name/Company: ${prospectName}
- Industry: ${industry}
- Business function: ${businessFunction}
- Their main problem: ${painPoint}
- Hook angle: ${hookAngle}
- Tools they mentioned: ${knownTools}
- Specific things they want: ${automationOpps}

## MY BACKGROUND (CUSTOMIZE THIS SECTION)
- [Your years of experience and expertise]
- [Your specialization or unique approach]
- [Key differentiator - e.g., no monthly fees, enterprise methodology, etc.]
- [Why you're uniquely qualified to help]

## CONSTRAINTS
- Use EXACTLY: 1 Trigger ‚Üí 4 Process Steps ‚Üí 1 Output
- Time saved: Use INDUSTRY-SPECIFIC ranges
- ROI: Use INDUSTRY-SPECIFIC hourly rates
- This is UPWORK - mention you saw their job posting
- Be specific to what THEY asked for in their job description
- Keep language conversational and non-technical

## GENERATE THE FOLLOWING:

---

## 1. AUTOMATION FLOW DIAGRAM

[TRIGGER] ‚Üí [STEP 1] ‚Üí [STEP 2] ‚Üí [STEP 3] ‚Üí [STEP 4] ‚Üí [OUTPUT]

Expand each box with bullets. Make it SPECIFIC to what they asked for.

**Estimated time saved**: [Industry-specific range] hours per week

---

## 2. BEFORE vs AFTER

### BEFORE (Manual Process)
- Step 1-4: What they described as their current pain
- **Time spent**: [X] hours/week
- **Problems**: [From their job description]

### AFTER (Automated)
- Step 1-4: Specifically what they asked for
- **Time spent**: [X] minutes/week
- **Result**: [What they said they wanted]

---

## 3. WHY THIS MATTERS

[One sentence connecting to their SPECIFIC job posting and pain points]

---

## 4. LOOM SCRIPT (90-120 seconds)

**[HOOK - 10 seconds]**
"Hey ${prospectName}, I saw your Upwork post about ${hookAngle}. This is exactly the kind of system I specialize in building."

**[CREDIBILITY - 12 seconds]**
"[Your background/credibility statement]"

**[TRANSITION - 5 seconds]**
"Let me show you exactly what Id build for you."

**[FLOW WALKTHROUGH - 50 seconds]**
[Walk through the flow, specifically addressing what they asked for]

**[OBJECTION HANDLER - 8 seconds]**
[Address their most likely concern based on job description]

**[BEFORE/AFTER + ROI - 12 seconds]**
[Show transformation with industry-specific numbers]

**[CTA - 10 seconds]**
"Id love to chat more about this. If youre interested, just reply here on Upwork or hit the 'Hire' button and we can set up a quick call to discuss the specifics. Talk soon."

---

## 5. UPWORK PROPOSAL SNIPPET

Write a 2-3 sentence opening for an Upwork proposal that:
- Shows I read their job description carefully
- Mentions a specific thing from their post
- Positions my background as relevant
- Invites them to watch the Loom video

---

## 6. VISUAL PROMPTS FOR WHIMSICAL/FIGMA

### 6A. BEFORE FLOW PROMPT:
[Customized to their specific manual process]

### 6B. AFTER FLOW PROMPT:
[Customized to what they asked for]

---

## 7. QUICK REFERENCE CARD

**One-liner pitch:** [Specific to their job]

**Key stats:**
- Time saved: [Industry range]
- Dollar value: [Industry rate calculation]
- Implementation: ~2 weeks
- Ongoing fees: [Your pricing model]

**Pricing guidance:**
- For fixed-price: [Your range]
- For hourly: [Your range]
- Include: [What's included]

---

Generated by Loom Asset Generator`;

  return JSON.stringify({
    model: "claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens: 4500,
    messages: [
      {
        role: "user",
        content: prompt
      }
    ]
  });
})() }}

value.Tokens Used: ={{ $('Generate Loom Script with AI').item.json.usage.input_tokens + $('Generate Loom Script with AI').item.json.usage.output_tokens }}
